How many people are affected by autosomal dominant hyper-IgE syndrome ?,"This condition is rare, affecting fewer than 1 per million people.",GHR,autosomal dominant hyper-IgE syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to autosomal dominant hyper-IgE syndrome ?,"Mutations in the STAT3 gene cause most cases of AD-HIES. This gene provides instructions for making a protein that plays an important role in several body systems. To carry out
